Didn't manage to get Heritrix 3.0.0 building a job and crawling.

First I u=
sed "IBM J9 VM (build 2.4, JRE 1.6.0 IBM J9 2.4 Linux"
but got "java.lang.C=
lassNotFoundException: sun.security.tools.KeyTool".
IBM points to SUN and S=
UN says not to use any sun.* class!
http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/faq/fa=
q-sun-packages.html

So I changed to "java version "1.6.0_0" "OpenJDK Runti=
me Environment
(IcedTea6 1.6.2)" which starts now.
I tried to create a new =
job, no success but a java.lang.NullPointerException. :-(

After that I cli=
cked on profile-defaults and copied the job to "newjob".
Changed back to en=
gine page, did a rescan and saw my new job.
Very strange...

Next was to ed=
it my "newjob". Made all changes, saved the settings
and clicked on build. =
Next problem:
2010-02-24T10:43:00.676Z INFO Job instantiated
2010-02-24T10:=
43:00.597Z WARNING PropertyEditor [sun.beans.editors.EnumEditor] found thro=
ugh deprecated global PropertyEditorManager fallback - consider using a mor=
e isolated form of registration, e.g. on the BeanWrapper/BeanFactory!

So I=
'm stuck here. Can't launch anything because launch is disabled.
Only butto=
n is teardown.

How to proceed?

Does Heritrix 3.0.0 must have a Sun JDK?

=
System requirements say "Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 1.6".

Regards, Ber=
nd
